pages.text: $(l)(Passive-ShipDestroyed)/$Guardians are similar to $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/energy_shield)Energy Shields/$, with a few differences. Instead of being deployed at the start of a game, they're deployed on top of random ships when the ship that has the ability is destroyed. Each Guardian has two stats: Amount and HP. Amount determines how many of your ships get a shield, and HP determines the health of those shields.

Note that these shields will only cover undamaged parts of the chosen ships, and will never target ships that are destroyed. So for example, if you have a ship that is three long and has taken 1 damage, then you'll see that the provied shield only protects the two undamaged parts.

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(br)$(li)Remember that this type of ability doesn't trigger if the ship is taken out by another passive ability! If you're lucky, one of your passive abilities may take out a ship with this ability, preventing it from being deployed!
